snippet: Arvo Pärt’s mystical luminosity was paired with Sibelius and Mozart at the White Light Festival on Sunday.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert by Estonian National Symphony Orchestra and Estonian Philharmonic Chamber Choir, playing music by composer Arvo Part, at Avery Fisher Hall, part of Lincoln Center's White Light Festival.
lead_paragraph: Arvo Pärt’s mystical luminosity was paired with Sibelius and Mozart at the White Light Festival on Sunday.

headline.seo: Arvo Pärt Works in Lincoln Center White Light Festival
headline.main: Estonian Master, Through Lens of Compatriots
headline.print_headline: Estonian Master, Through Lens of Compatriots
